artist.description: Name of the artist that illustrated the card art.

borderColor.description: Color of the border. Can be {{code:black}}, {{code:borderless}}, {{code:gold}}, {{code:silver}} or {{code:white}}.

colorIdentity.description: List of all colors in card’s mana cost, rules text and any color indicator.

colorIndicator.description: List of all colors in card's color indicator (The symbol showing the colors of the card).

colors.description: List of all colors in card’s mana cost and any color indicator. Some cards are special (such as Devoid cards or other cards with certain rules text).

convertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the card.

count.description: How many of this card exists in a deck.

duelDeck.description: If the card is in a duel deck product, can be {{code:a}}(left) or {{code:b}}(right).

faceConvertedManaCost.description: The converted mana cost of the face of either half or part of the card.

flavorText.example: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."
flavorText.description: Italicized text found below the rules text that has no game function.

frameVersion.description: Version of the card frame style. Can be {{code:1993}}, {{code:1997}}, {{code:2003}}, {{code:2015}} or {{code:future}}.

hand.description: Starting maximum hand size total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer.

hasFoil.description: Can the card be found in foil?

hasNonFoil.description: Can the card be found in non-foil?

isAlternative.description: The card has some kind of alternative variation to its printed counterpart.

isArena.description: Is the card available in Magic: The Gathering Arena?

isMtgo.description: Is the card available in Magic: The Gathering Online?

isOnlineOnly.description: Is the card only available online?

isPaper.description: Is the card available in print?

isPromo.description: Is the card a promotional print?

isReserved.description: Is the card on the MTG Reserved List?

isStarter.description: Is this card found in a booster pack?

isStorySpotlight.description: Does the card have a story spotlight?

isTextless.description: Does the card normally have a text box, but doesn't on this card?

isTimeshifted.description: Is this card "timeshifted"? (A feature from Time Spiral block)

layout.description: Type of card layout. Can be {{code:normal}}, {{code:split}}, {{code:flip}}, {{code:transform}}, {{code:meld}}, {{code:leveler}}, {{code:saga}}, {{code:planar}}, {{code:scheme}}, {{code:vanguard}}, {{code:token}}, {{code:double_faced_token}}, {{code:emblem}}, {{code:augment}}, {{code:aftermath}} or {{code:host}}.

life.description: Starting life total modifier. A plus or minus character preceeds an integer. Used only on Vanguard cards.

mcmId.description: The Magic Card Market card ID.

mcmMetaId.description: The Magic Card Market card meta ID.

mcmName.description: The Magic Card Market card name.

mtgArenaId.description: The Magic: The Gathering Arena card ID.

mtgoFoilId.description: The Magic: The Gathering Online card foil ID.

mtgoId.description: The Magic: The Gathering Online card ID.

multiverseId.description: An integer most cards have which Wizards of the Coast uses as a card identifier.

name.description: Names of each face on the card. Meld cards are listed in the order of {{code:CardA}}, {{code:Meld}}, {{code:CardB}}.

names.example: ["Nicol Bolas, the Ravager","Nicol Bolas, the Arisen"]
names.description: Names of each face on the card. Meld cards are listed in the order of CardA, Meld, CardB.

originalText.example: "Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)"
originalText.description: Text on the card as originally printed.

originalType.description: Type as originally printed. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.

printings.description: List of sets the card was printed in, in uppercase.

scryfallId.description: A universal unique ID (v4) generated by Scryfall. Note that cards with multiple faces are not unique.

scryfallOracleId.description: A unique ID for this card’s oracle identity. This value is consistent across reprinted card editions, and unique among different cards with the same name (tokens, Unstable variants, etc).

scryfallIllustrationId.description: A unique identifier for the card artwork that remains consistent across reprints. Newly spoiled cards may not have this field yet.

side.description: Identifier of the side. Used on cards with multiple faces, such as {{code:flip}}, {{code:split}}, {{code:transform}} cards. Can be {{code:a}}, {{code:b}}, or {{code:c}}.

subtypes.description: List of card subtypes found after em-dash.

supertypes.description: List of card supertypes found before em-dash.

tcgplayerProductId.description: Numeric identifier for the card for TCGPlayer.

tcgplayerPurchaseUrl.description: URL which redirects to TCGPlayer website’s card page.

text.example: "Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nDeathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)"

type.description: Type of the card. Includes any supertypes and subtypes.

types.description: List of types of the card.

uuid.description: A universal unique ID (v5) generated by MTGJSON. Each entry is unique.

variations.description: List of uuid id's of this card with alternate printings in the same set. Excludes Un-sets.

watermark.description: Name of the watermark on the card.
